verses.verse: My soul <S%H5315><s%> is weary <S%H5354><s%> of my life <S%H2416><s%>; I will leave <S%H5800><s%> my complaint <S%H7879><s%> upon myself <S%H1696><s%>; I will speak in the bitterness <S%H4751><s%> of my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
I will say <S%H559><s%> unto God <S%H433><s%>, Do not condemn <S%H7561><s%> me <S%H3045><s%>; show me why you contend with me <S%H7378><s%>.

Is it good <S%H2895><s%> unto you that you should oppress <S%H6231><s%>, that you should despise <S%H3988><s%> the work <S%H3018><s%> of your hands <S%H3709><s%>, and shine <S%H3313><s%> upon the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>?
Have you eyes <S%H5869><s%> of flesh <S%H1320><s%>? or see <S%H7200><s%> you as man <S%H582><s%> sees <S%H7200><s%>?
Are your days <S%H3117><s%> as the days <S%H3117><s%> of man <S%H582><s%>? are your years <S%H8141><s%> as man <S%H1397><s%>'s days <S%H3117><s%>,
That you inquire <S%H1245><s%> after my iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, and search <S%H1875><s%> after my sin <S%H2403><s%>?
You know <S%H1847><s%> that I am not wicked <S%H7561><s%>; and there is none that can deliver <S%H5337><s%> out of your hand <S%H3027><s%>.
Your hands <S%H3027><s%> have made <S%H6087><s%> me and fashioned <S%H6213><s%> me together <S%H3162><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>; yet you do destroy me <S%H1104><s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%>, I beg you <S%H6213><s%>, that you have made me as the clay <S%H2563><s%>; and will you bring <S%H7725><s%> me into dust <S%H6083><s%> again <S%H7725><s%>?
Have you not poured me out <S%H5413><s%> as milk <S%H2461><s%>, and curdled <S%H7087><s%> me like cheese <S%H1385><s%>?
You have clothed <S%H3847><s%> me with skin <S%H5785><s%> and flesh <S%H1320><s%>, and have fenced <S%H7753><s%> me with bones <S%H6106><s%> and sinews <S%H1517><s%>.
You have granted <S%H6213><s%> me life <S%H2416><s%> and favor <S%H2617><s%>, and your visitation <S%H6486><s%> has preserved <S%H8104><s%> my spirit <S%H7307><s%>.
And these things have you hid <S%H6845><s%> in your heart <S%H3824><s%>: I know that this is with you <S%H3045><s%>.
If I sin <S%H2398><s%>, then you mark <S%H8104><s%> me <S%H5352><s%>, and you will not acquit me from my iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.

If I be wicked <S%H7561><s%>, woe <S%H480><s%> unto me <S%H6663><s%>; and if I be righteous, yet will I not lift up <S%H5375><s%> my head <S%H7218><s%>. I am full <S%H7649><s%> of confusion <S%H7036><s%>; therefore see <S%H7202><s%> you my affliction <S%H6040><s%>;
For it increases <S%H1342><s%>. You hunt <S%H6679><s%> me as a fierce lion <S%H7826><s%>: and again <S%H7725><s%> you show yourself marvelous upon me <S%H6381><s%>.

You renew <S%H2318><s%> your witnesses <S%H5707><s%> against me <S%H7235><s%>, and increase your indignation <S%H3708><s%> upon me <S%H5978><s%>; changes <S%H2487><s%> and war are against me <S%H6635><s%>.
Therefore then have you brought me forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the womb <S%H7358><s%>? Oh that I had given up the Spirit <S%H1478><s%>, and no eye <S%H5869><s%> had seen me <S%H7200><s%>!
I should have been as though I had not been <S%H2986><s%>; I should have been carried from the womb <S%H990><s%> to the grave <S%H6913><s%>.
Are not my days <S%H3117><s%> few <S%H4592><s%>? cease <S%H2308><s%> then <S%H7896><s%>, and let me alone, that I may take comfort <S%H1082><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%>,
Before I go <S%H3212><s%> from where I shall not return <S%H7725><s%>, even to the land <S%H776><s%> of darkness <S%H2822><s%> and the shadow of death <S%H6757><s%>;

A land <S%H776><s%> of darkness <S%H5890><s%>, as darkness <S%H652><s%> itself <S%H6757><s%>; and of the shadow of death, without any order <S%H5468><s%>, and where the light <S%H3313><s%> is as darkness <S%H652><s%>.
